name: Donation Please!
description:
Entry for the 2019 GDL Christmas GameJam. Christmas + Zombie.

We never quite got to the zombie part (mindless holiday shoppers).

You can basically just walk around.  (Looks better in FullScreen mode)

This was mostly an opportunity for us to get back into game dev after many years on hiatus.

Created by John & Sophia

Music: "A Christmas Tale" by lena_orso (via freesound.org)

Art by Sophia, Programming by John (React + Matter-js & react-game-kit)
